title: Spine-Chilling Video Shows Man Laughing After Stabbing His Girlfriend 15 Times, Killing Her
text:
A killer stabbed his girlfriend 15 times and dumped her body in a bath tub. A video of the same freak killer laughing moments after committing the crime is going viral.

33-year-old Michael Foran strangled June Jones and knifed her 15 times in her neck and heart last year. June was a mother of three, and Foran hid her body under blankets in a bathtub in her West Bromwich, West Midlands home. Her body was found 21 days later by the police.

Reportedly Foran watched the event of police kicking down the front door of her house and finding her body, unfold, as he hid nearby.

Foran was caught after the police launched a nationwide manhunt for him. Initially, he had denied the murder but he plead guilty recently and has been jailed for 17 years at Wolverhampton Crown Court.

What is as chilling as the cold-blooded murder is the footage that shows him smiling and laughing, moments after committing a crime. Keith O'Dwyer Foran’s neighbor who assisted him in the crime, has also been jailed for 16 months for helping an offender.
